<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ferocious Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=330) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 136 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wild Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316)

</column>

---

You have mastered the shape of ferocious dinosaurs. Add the forms listed in [_dinosaur form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=72) to your [_wild shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=481) list. Whenever you use _wild shape_ to take a form that grants you a specific Athletics modifier, you gain a +1 status bonus to your Athletics checks.
name: Ferocious Shape
